overview: Jean-Pierre Naegeli joined Paul Capital in 2000. As Partner, he is responsible for sourcing and structuring transactions as well as managing Paul Capital Healthcareâ€™s overall due diligence efforts. Prior to joining Paul Capital, Mr. Naegeli spent nearly a decade at Johnson & Johnson, initially in operational and corporate roles, including assessing healthcare technologies across all divisions, followed by five years in principal investing at Johnson & Johnson Development Corporation, the strategic investment and venture capital subsidiary of Johnson & Johnson. In addition, Mr. Naegeli has extensive engineering experience in Europe.
